data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Hoshangabad, Madhya Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hoshangabad, Madhya Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Hoshangabad, Madhya Pradesh, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 13,655 believers in Hoshangabad.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Hoshangabad who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, encourage the 13,655 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Hoshangabad do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Hoshangabad, Madhya Pradesh, India to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.
